articles.title: The Gemini Android app is already available in more regions, including Europe and Asia - Android Authority
articles.description: The Gemini Android app has become available in multiple other regions, including Europe and Asia, but you'll have to sideload it for now.
articles.content:
• The Gemini app should officially roll out in multiple other regions today.
  • However, you can now sideload the app and get it working in English in multiple countries.
